excerpt: The Buzziest Books of October | 2024 Get ready for a spine-tingling literary adventure this October with our eerie selection of must-read titles! From chilling thrillers to enchanting romances, prepare to be bewitched by the captivating tales that await. Curious about the books that are sending shivers down readers’ spines... Read More
text: 25 Oct 2024 The Buzziest Books of October | 2024 Get ready for a spine-tingling literary adventure this October with our eerie selection of must-read titles! From chilling thrillers to enchanting romances, prepare to be bewitched by the captivating tales that await. Curious about the books that are sending shivers down readers’ spines this month? Don’t miss our roundup of October’s most buzzworthy new releases. Happy haunting and happy reading! Ruthless King (The Mancini Mafia Book 1) by Ivy Davis Release Date: October 1 2024 I had a choice: marry him or kill him. I’m forced to marry Nico Mancini so I can kill him for the murder of my father. Except, Nico isn’t the monster I thought he was. But I can’t love the man I’m supposed to kill. I’ll have to make a decision before it’s too late: kill the man I love or risk everything to be with him. Buy on Amazon Luck and Love in 1902 by Jody Gorran Release Date: September 23 2024 Everyone could use a little luck! Do you think you have life figured out, as Ethan and Alice did? They believed they had their futures planned. In this historical romance novella set in Saint-Pierre Martinique in 1902, events conspire to tear them apart as they grow closer together. And when a catastrophic event strikes, will luck be on their side? Buy on Amazon Starship’s Mage, 10th Anniversary Edition (Book 1) by Glynn Stewart Release Date: October 8 2024 In 2014, Glynn Stewart blended sci-fi and magic in a saga where humanity reaches the stars—by magic. Tensions rise between aristocratic Mages that make this high tech future possible and everyone else, and a young man’s struggle to find work as a Jump Mage might just light the fire. The 10th Anniversary Edition of Book 1 is perfect for new readers. Buy on Amazon Kianola by Nathan Roth Release Date: September 16 2024 Can a hero in-game become a hero in real life? Middle school challenges collide with the freedom of an online fantasy world. Nole, a shy eighth grader, escapes into Enix, reinventing himself. As he faces bullies, crushes, and self-doubt, he finds solace in a realm where he can be anyone, growing up in both reality and the virtual world. Buy on Amazon The Woman in Coach D by Sarah A. Denzil Release Date: October 10 2024 Sixteen years ago, a dare-gone-wrong killed Jenny’s best friend. Or so she thought. Because the girl who once vanished is back, and Jenny just saw her on the train. Buy on Amazon Full Circle (Belle Bannon Series) by Mike Pace Release Date: September 15 2024 With a target on her back, Belle Bannon must race a ticking clock to both rescue the next victim, before it’s too late, and save the residents and visitors of the town from a deadly catastrophe. Buy on Amazon The Mudpuddle Manual of Natural Magic (Natural Magic Book 1) by Ciara Blume Release Date: October 1 2024 When Maida’s lifelong dream of owning an enchanted bookshop comes true, she can hardly believe her luck. But there’s a catch: to claim her inheritance, she must leave behind her safe, predictable life and step into a tumultuous world where magic isn’t just in books—it’s real. Buy on Amazon Burn the Freeze by S.M. McVicar Release Date: October 7 2024 Can one rebel stop the billionaires (“The 31”) who control society’s mind? After the Freeze Act passes, people are classified by personality type, and those unwilling to comply are labeled Deviators. When Cal Shook becomes a Deviator, he loses everything. Until he discovers a technology that can tap into the universe’s hidden intelligence. And now, “The 31” want him dead. The Matrix meets 1984. Buy on Amazon The Pythagorean by Alexander Morpheigh Release Date: July 14 2024 The book “Pythagorean” is a blend of fantasy and science fiction genres. A modern young man, finds himself in ancient Greece, where he becomes a disciple of Pythagoras. He learns a wealth of knowledge, practical ethics, and, most importantly, he transforms into a true individual. The book is written in a humor and light style for easy and fun read. Buy on Amazon The Big Island Travel and Adventure Guide (Travel and Adventure Guides) by Ocean Breeze Adventures Release Date: October 13 2024 Step onto Hawaii’s Big Island, where history and natural beauty collide, creating an unforgettable paradise. From pristine, colorful beaches and dramatic landscapes to endless outdoor thrills and rich cultural heritage, Hawaii’s Big Island offers an unparalleled adventure for every type of traveler. Pack your bags and let’s go on an adventure! Buy on Amazon Gold Digger by Susie Tate Release Date: October 17 2024 He’s a Duke and a billionaire, he owns a good 10% of the UK, and he’s been voted Britain’s Sexiest Aristocrat, but Oliver Harding still doesn’t know what to do about the massive crush he has on his cleaner. Gold Digger is a Billionaire Duke, struggling Cinderella, friends to enemies to lovers, he falls first and harder contemporary romance. Buy on Amazon We Are Made by John Ludlam Release Date: October 16 2024 London, 1938. William is grieving over his former teacher, killed fighting for the Republicans in Spain. As Europe slides towards war, William is supporting his family by working in a factory manufacturing Spitfire parts. He bumps into Elizabeth, an old school friend, and soon he’s falling in love – but Elizabeth is no longer the girl he remembers. Buy on Amazon The Fae (Of Gods and Monsters Book 2) by KD Pryor Release Date: October 15 2024 Aisling Doyle, a 45-year-old Dreammaster apprentice, is in over her head in Galway, Ireland. Fleeing her sinister aunt, she must master her powers to save her family and protect Ireland. As evil stirs, can she harness her magic in time? Get The Fae, now to find out in this thrilling second book of the Of Gods and Monsters series by KD Pryor! Buy on Amazon The Shadows of Erathal (The Legends of Evorath Book 1) by Joseph P Macolino Release Date: October 29 2024 Jaldor enjoyed the simple life. But his world is turned upside down when his farm is attacked by dark elves. After being rescued by an unlikely group of heroes, he finds himself in the middle of a conflict that could change Evorath for good. And in a world of a magic, the evil that lurks in the shadows may be more than these heroes can handle. Buy on Amazon Run, Robot! by Russell Lee Baldwin Release Date: October 15 2024 In 2099, Earth is Kardashev Type I, yet humanity lives under hidden control. This mystery tech thriller builds suspense from a snarky AI which schemes to transform people into transhuman beings. Biologically altered, a woman struggles in psychological terror, wanting to hit the Overmind’s kill switch, but fearing what her mortal sacrifice can mean. Buy on Amazon Alice Pemberton’s Bureau Of Scientific Inquiry (McGilliverse Book 2) by George Allen Miller Release Date: October 23 2024 Alice Pemberton is on a quest to find the secrets of death. For her latest experiment, Alice has volunteered Eugene McGillicuddy, via quasi-death, to find a theoretical death-particle. However, before she can bring Eugene back, Secret Service agents come looking for Eugene. Alice must now take the lead, solve the case, and save Eugene. Buy on Amazon More Than One Life: A Memoir by Gail Ingis Release Date: October 1 2024 Who says you can’t live more than one life? At 88, Gail Ingis shows that life is full of new chapters. From starting a design school at 46 to a vibrant art career, her memoir More Than One Life is filled with triumphs, wisdom, and humor. Journey through Gail’s rich memories of love, loss, and discovery, inspiring readers to embrace life at any age. Buy on Amazon Asher and the Prince: The Apex Blade by Evan J. Corbin Release Date: October 28 2024 Asher and the Prince: The Apex Blade weaves together elements of medieval fantasy, LGBTQ romance, and science fiction, as Asher uncovers long-buried secrets that could change the future forever. Will his earnest plans save the kingdom, or will it unleash a fate darker than he ever imagined? Buy on Amazon meghan Recommended Posts
html:
25 Oct 2024

The Buzziest Books of October | 2024

Get ready for a spine-tingling literary adventure this October with our eerie selection of must-read titles! From chilling thrillers to enchanting romances, prepare to be bewitched by the captivating tales that await. Curious about the books that are sending shivers down readers’ spines this month? Don’t miss our roundup of October’s most buzzworthy new releases. Happy haunting and happy reading!

Ruthless King (The Mancini Mafia Book 1)

by Ivy Davis

Release Date: October 1 2024

I had a choice: marry him or kill him. I’m forced to marry Nico Mancini so I can kill him for the murder of my father. Except, Nico isn’t the monster I thought he was. But I can’t love the man I’m supposed to kill. I’ll have to make a decision before it’s too late: kill the man I love or risk everything to be with him.

Buy on Amazon

Luck and Love in 1902

by Jody Gorran

Release Date: September 23 2024

Everyone could use a little luck! Do you think you have life figured out, as Ethan and Alice did? They believed they had their futures planned. In this historical romance novella set in Saint-Pierre Martinique in 1902, events conspire to tear them apart as they grow closer together. And when a catastrophic event strikes, will luck be on their side?

Buy on Amazon

Starship’s Mage, 10th Anniversary Edition (Book 1)

by Glynn Stewart

Release Date: October 8 2024

In 2014, Glynn Stewart blended sci-fi and magic in a saga where humanity reaches the stars—by magic. Tensions rise between aristocratic Mages that make this high tech future possible and everyone else, and a young man’s struggle to find work as a Jump Mage might just light the fire. The 10th Anniversary Edition of Book 1 is perfect for new readers.

Buy on Amazon

Kianola

by Nathan Roth

Release Date: September 16 2024

Can a hero in-game become a hero in real life? Middle school challenges collide with the freedom of an online fantasy world. Nole, a shy eighth grader, escapes into Enix, reinventing himself. As he faces bullies, crushes, and self-doubt, he finds solace in a realm where he can be anyone, growing up in both reality and the virtual world.

Buy on Amazon

The Woman in Coach D

by Sarah A. Denzil

Release Date: October 10 2024

Sixteen years ago, a dare-gone-wrong killed Jenny’s best friend. Or so she thought. Because the girl who once vanished is back, and Jenny just saw her on the train.

Buy on Amazon

Full Circle (Belle Bannon Series)

by Mike Pace

Release Date: September 15 2024

With a target on her back, Belle Bannon must race a ticking clock to both rescue the next victim, before it’s too late, and save the residents and visitors of the town from a deadly catastrophe.

Buy on Amazon

The Mudpuddle Manual of Natural Magic (Natural Magic Book 1)

by Ciara Blume

Release Date: October 1 2024

When Maida’s lifelong dream of owning an enchanted bookshop comes true, she can hardly believe her luck. But there’s a catch: to claim her inheritance, she must leave behind her safe, predictable life and step into a tumultuous world where magic isn’t just in books—it’s real.

Buy on Amazon

Burn the Freeze

by S.M. McVicar

Release Date: October 7 2024

Can one rebel stop the billionaires (“The 31”) who control society’s mind? After the Freeze Act passes, people are classified by personality type, and those unwilling to comply are labeled Deviators. When Cal Shook becomes a Deviator, he loses everything. Until he discovers a technology that can tap into the universe’s hidden intelligence. And now, “The 31” want him dead. The Matrix meets 1984.

Buy on Amazon

The Pythagorean

by Alexander Morpheigh

Release Date: July 14 2024

The book “Pythagorean” is a blend of fantasy and science fiction genres. A modern young man, finds himself in ancient Greece, where he becomes a disciple of Pythagoras. He learns a wealth of knowledge, practical ethics, and, most importantly, he transforms into a true individual. The book is written in a humor and light style for easy and fun read.

Buy on Amazon

The Big Island Travel and Adventure Guide (Travel and Adventure Guides)

by Ocean Breeze Adventures

Release Date: October 13 2024

Step onto Hawaii’s Big Island, where history and natural beauty collide, creating an unforgettable paradise. From pristine, colorful beaches and dramatic landscapes to endless outdoor thrills and rich cultural heritage, Hawaii’s Big Island offers an unparalleled adventure for every type of traveler. Pack your bags and let’s go on an adventure!

Buy on Amazon

Gold Digger

by Susie Tate

Release Date: October 17 2024

He’s a Duke and a billionaire, he owns a good 10% of the UK, and he’s been voted Britain’s Sexiest Aristocrat, but Oliver Harding still doesn’t know what to do about the massive crush he has on his cleaner. Gold Digger is a Billionaire Duke, struggling Cinderella, friends to enemies to lovers, he falls first and harder contemporary romance.

Buy on Amazon

We Are Made

by John Ludlam

Release Date: October 16 2024

London, 1938. William is grieving over his former teacher, killed fighting for the Republicans in Spain. As Europe slides towards war, William is supporting his family by working in a factory manufacturing Spitfire parts. He bumps into Elizabeth, an old school friend, and soon he’s falling in love – but Elizabeth is no longer the girl he remembers.

Buy on Amazon

The Fae (Of Gods and Monsters Book 2)

by KD Pryor

Release Date: October 15 2024

Aisling Doyle, a 45-year-old Dreammaster apprentice, is in over her head in Galway, Ireland. Fleeing her sinister aunt, she must master her powers to save her family and protect Ireland. As evil stirs, can she harness her magic in time? Get The Fae, now to find out in this thrilling second book of the Of Gods and Monsters series by KD Pryor!

Buy on Amazon

The Shadows of Erathal (The Legends of Evorath Book 1)

by Joseph P Macolino

Release Date: October 29 2024

Jaldor enjoyed the simple life. But his world is turned upside down when his farm is attacked by dark elves. After being rescued by an unlikely group of heroes, he finds himself in the middle of a conflict that could change Evorath for good. And in a world of a magic, the evil that lurks in the shadows may be more than these heroes can handle.

Buy on Amazon

Run, Robot!

by Russell Lee Baldwin

Release Date: October 15 2024

In 2099, Earth is Kardashev Type I, yet humanity lives under hidden control. This mystery tech thriller builds suspense from a snarky AI which schemes to transform people into transhuman beings. Biologically altered, a woman struggles in psychological terror, wanting to hit the Overmind’s kill switch, but fearing what her mortal sacrifice can mean.

Buy on Amazon

Alice Pemberton’s Bureau Of Scientific Inquiry (McGilliverse Book 2)

by George Allen Miller

Release Date: October 23 2024

Alice Pemberton is on a quest to find the secrets of death. For her latest experiment, Alice has volunteered Eugene McGillicuddy, via quasi-death, to find a theoretical death-particle. However, before she can bring Eugene back, Secret Service agents come looking for Eugene. Alice must now take the lead, solve the case, and save Eugene.

Buy on Amazon

More Than One Life: A Memoir

by Gail Ingis

Release Date: October 1 2024

Who says you can’t live more than one life? At 88, Gail Ingis shows that life is full of new chapters. From starting a design school at 46 to a vibrant art career, her memoir More Than One Life is filled with triumphs, wisdom, and humor. Journey through Gail’s rich memories of love, loss, and discovery, inspiring readers to embrace life at any age.

Buy on Amazon

Asher and the Prince: The Apex Blade

by Evan J. Corbin

Release Date: October 28 2024

Asher and the Prince: The Apex Blade weaves together elements of medieval fantasy, LGBTQ romance, and science fiction, as Asher uncovers long-buried secrets that could change the future forever. Will his earnest plans save the kingdom, or will it unleash a fate darker than he ever imagined?

Buy on Amazon
